EmailTemplate.description: ELT Confirmation message requesting coding sheet
EmailTemplate.name: ELT Order Coding Sheet Request and Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell ELT Order {!Case.CaseNumber}, {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}
We received your Emergency Locator Transmitter (ELT) order.
To start we need your coding sheet to be submitted electronically at MyAersoapce.com.
We've included a copy of the ELT Users Guide.
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
